Meteara had the first thing that could resemeble in some way to a 
smile. 

Meteara: I will remember your words, Cybertronian Firaxis. And maybe 
the next time we see each other will not be a fight to the death 
between us. I wish you... luck... in your search for a dog.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He glances back at her and grins inwardly.  "I believe I said 
'You'd 
> do well to remember that.'"  He thinks for a moment.  "It is what it 
is.  You 
> should not group people based on their species but based on their 
actions.  
> And you should remember that when you're eventually outnumbered and 
> outgunned."  He raises his hand to cut off any objections.  "I know, 
you'll 
> never be outmatched by these infidels. But they may, eventually have 
some 
> brilliant idea that confuses you long enough for them to defeat you. 
 It 
> happens to the best of us."  He nods curtly.  "Now if you'll excuse 
me, I 
> have a dog to find."
